trans-unit.source: Represents the presence information of a peer.
trans-unit.target: 代表對等電腦的顯示狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The presence of a peer specifies a certain level of participation in a peer collaboration network, such as whether or not the peer has logged into or out of the peer collaboration network, or has set presence status to "Away".
trans-unit.target: 對等電腦存在指定特定層級的參與對等共同作業網路，例如對等電腦已登入或移出對等共同作業網路，或已設定為"離開 」 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> 物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: New instances of <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus> generated by this constructor contains a default PeerPresenceInfo value equal to "Online".
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus>由此產生建構函式包含預設 PeerPresenceInfo 值等於 「 上線 」。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> 物件預設的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: New instances of <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus> generated by this constructor contains a default PeerPresenceInfo value equal to "Online".
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus>由此產生建構函式包含預設 PeerPresenceInfo 值等於 「 上線 」。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> object that includes a Unicode string describing the presence status the local peer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> 物件的執行個體，後者會包含描述本機對等電腦顯示狀態的 Unicode 字串。

trans-unit.source: New instances of <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus> generated by this constructor contain a default PeerPresenceInfo value equal to "Online".
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus>這個建構函式所產生包含預設 PeerPresenceInfo 值等於 「 上線 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Unicode string further describing the presence status for the local peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定進一步描述本機對等電腦顯示狀態的 Unicode 字串。

trans-unit.source: Unicode string describing the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: 描述對等電腦顯示狀態的 Unicode 字串。

trans-unit.source: This string is limited to 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 此字串是限制為 255 個 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the presence status of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定本機對等電腦的顯示狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus" /> enumeration that specifies the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus" /> 列舉型別 (Enumeration)，指定對等電腦的顯示狀態。
